name: Miss Saigon
description:
Based on the hit Broadway Musical, MISS SAIGON has you commanding a US Air Force helicopter, evacuating American personnel during the Fall of Saigon. Use the arrow keys to land on the moving platform to score point and collect oil drums for fuel. You'll need patience and good timing if you hope to succeed. Bring our boys home!

  • 16 colour EGA graphics!
  • Procedural generated backgrounds - no two jungles are ever the same!
  • Fast paced action that ramps up as you progress!
